amendment.description: Amendment deleted section 517(a) which provided for the sunset of direct loan programs under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 517 in the bill and to add a new section providing for transparency and accountability for minority and disadvantaged farmers.

action.text: Conyers amendment (A023) modified by unanimous consent. The modification retains the instruction to strike section 517 of the bill but deletes the instruction to insert a new section.
On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A023) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
